entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GC runs but working set remains the same? #90640
  • [8.0] French abbreviated month names not showing up as expected #90639
    8.0.0
  • [iOS] Make HybridGlobalization the default when nativeaot is enabled #90633
    9.0.0
  • Add XXXIsEnabled method generation to the LoggerMessage generator #90629
    Future
  • Awkward Time Format Patterns on Linux. No Space Before AM/PM Designator. #90627
    9.0.0
  • Custom Marshallers never use stateful GetPinnableReference on struct #90621
    9.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Generated methods will call both ConvertToManaged and ConvertToManagedFinally if present #90618
    9.0.0
  • Custom Marshaller shape docs need to be updated #90617
    8.0.0
  • WinHttpHandler assertion failure #90613
  • When a backing file for a MemoryMappedFile is no longer available, reading from or writing to it throws an uncatchable exception #90608
  • Allow SDKs to tweak the error message when ILLink fails #90607
  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource failing in CI #90605
  • [Test Failure]: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http30.EventSource_ConnectionPoolAtMaxConnections_LogsRequestLeftQueue #90603
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #90602
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Intrinsify Vector128.ExtractMostSignificantBits for floating element types #90600
    9.0.0
  • DOTNET_EnableAvx512F=0 does not disable Vector512.IsHardwareAccelerated in WSL #90598
    8.0.0
  • BinderTracingTest_ResolutionFlow test fails #90593
  • [API Proposal]: Interface dispatch cache to avoid method resolution at runtime #90592
  • Logging source generator should support generic methods (`SYSLIB1011` should be lifted) #90589
    Future
  • [debugger][mono] Tracking issue for debugger new features and improvements #90587
    9.0.0
  • Telemetry target fails in rc1 #90584
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #90580
  • Unit tests that pass on Windows, fail on Linux (Ubuntu). #90579
    8.0.0
  • NET8 breaking change due to TypeForwardedTo attribute missing for PEFileKinds #90578
    8.0.0
  • JsonConstructorAttribute not working for private/internal ctor in .NET 8.0 preview7 #90577
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe logs unintended events during rundown #90575
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConfigurationExtensions.IsPresent(this IConfigurationSection?) #90574
  • ToFrozenDictionary function throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException exception in .Net 8 Pewview 7 #90567
    8.0.0
  • Lock contention in StackTrace/Exception.ToString() #90563
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Move Linker repo to Runtime repo #75278
    8.0.0
  • coreclr build crashes on Linux with newest clang 13 #65676
    8.0.0
  • [Profiler] Non-blocking garbage collections are not reported as induced #86541
    9.0.0
  • Define libc targeting plan #69361
    8.0.0
  • Make public surface area of different CoreLibs consistent #72594
    8.0.0
  • Make it easier to file issues for CI failures #44207
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT app crashes when run on a machine with an ETW session with GCHeapDump and Type keywords enabled #88491
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid codegen with Unsafe.As #90596
    8.0.0
  • NTLM 401 macOS (Apple sillicon) #82547
    Future
  • NTAuthentication.MakeSignature produces different thing on macOS, Windows and Linux #65678
    Future
  • PlatformNotSupportedException thrown for System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.NodeFor #90311
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext not unloaded when server started and stopped #90114
  • Jit: reconsider policy for recursive inlines #41542
    Future
  • `HostApplicationBuilder` ctor enhancement #90604
  • [mono] Tests failing `System.Globalization.Calendars.IOS.Tests` on ios-like platforms #90497
    8.0.0
  • [EnC] FieldInfo.GetValue on a newly-added ValueType field crashes CoreCLR #76702
    9.0.0
  • Passing CancellationToken best practices #90507
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationManager is not trim compatible #49062
    Future
  • [wasm] Unable to get the value for a local when debugging a Blazor app #86395
    8.0.0
  • wasm][debugger] Refactor evaluateOnCallFrame #69639
    Future
  • Question about using NegotiateStream in linux and TokenImpersonationLevel #80846
    Future
  • Attributes.OnlyKeepUsed.NullableOnConstraints failing in dotnet-linker-tests #90431
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Win32 CreateProcess flags to ProcessStartInfo #90581
  • JsonConstructorAttribute not working with internal members. #90576
  • Assert failure: brick_table[b] != 0 #90452
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NO-MERGE / DESIGN DISCUSSION ONLY] Infra fixes for Ivan's JIT count test #90647
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Collapse PortableAppWithException test app into PortableApp #90645
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90643
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Unify with logging category matching #90642
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90637
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Add doc for the new invoker classes #90636
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/8.0] Return false from ComWrappers.Try... methods #90635
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add types with marshallers that implement every method from the marshaller shapes #90634
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix min alignment of structures with explicit layout. #90632
    area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add timeouts to SendReceive tests #90631
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90628
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono][ios] Revert LLVM mode for apple mobile tests #90624
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • (Draft) JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90619
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90616
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq.Expressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90615
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90612
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Set TasksConfiguration=RuntimeConfiguration for debugger tests #90611
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90606
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Assembly resolving adjustments. #90601
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90588
    needs-area-label
  • [ios] Add optimized property to the Native AOT sample app #90585
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Run InlineArray tests on the CI #90583
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement normalization functions #90582
    os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the error register in JIT_WriteBarrier. #90568
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix problems with `Assembler::ReflectionNotation()` #90565
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Reset OOB packages from September Release in the October Release #90561
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix profiler reason #90569
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Free segment event #90571
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations (#90285) #90337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90646
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • What is the expected behavior when a reference is missing? #90261
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Open up `EmbeddedXmlInfo` #90314
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improvements to Banned APIs #90165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Unify with logging category matching #90559
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90630
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90638
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90446
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add doc for the new invoker classes #90536
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Improve profiled casts #90594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return false from ComWrappers.Try... methods #90553
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Extract general syntax generation code to SyntaxFactoryExtensions and use where possible #90545
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Revert LLVM mode for apple mobile tests #90586
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #89502
    area-Build-mono
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Move iOS sim helix queue to MacOS 12 #90626
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix ToFrozenDictionary(selectors) on empty sources #90599
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections
  • Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90456
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Fix ToFrozenDictionary(selectors) on empty sources #90595
    area-System.Collections
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90573
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #90572
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Bump to RC2 #90557
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Fix NullableAttribute illink test failures #90449
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • gen0_bricks_cleared flag needs to be propagated when we change heap count #90457
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #90560
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0][manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #90562
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for `ldp`/`stp` optimizations #90534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add Pinned collection parameter type #90103
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add Caller Allocated Buffer collection marshaller and interface #90107
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [GC] Use RegisterFrozenSegment for STRESS_REGIONS #90523
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90409
    area-System.Threading
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use non-generic `Memmove` for pointers in `String` #90383
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add a --path command line argument as an alternative to MONO_P… #90544
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
